channel.title: Week1 on Carleton Computer Science Society
channel.description: Recent content in Week1 on Carleton Computer Science Society

item.title: Resume Review With Ciena
item.description: We are collaborating with Rachael King from Ciena for a resume review! Please note: This is not a 1 on 1 review. Selected resumes will be projected on a whiteboard as examples to provide advice Submitting your resume does not guarantee that it will be reviewed at the event There will be a Q&A period where you can ask questions Submitting your resume is not required to attend this event.
